name: S.R. Smith 66-209-596S2 Frontier III Replacement Diving Board, 6-Feet, Radiant White
short_description: Matching tread
SureFoot non-slip tread for maximum safety
Will retrofit onto the following S.R.Smith stands - Flyte-Deck II, 606 Cantilever, 656 Supreme, Salt Jump Stand and the U-Frame
Stainless Steel Hardware - resists corrosion. Weight capacity is 250 pounds
WARNING: Make sure your pool meets or exceeds size requirements for this board - Using the wrong board/stand combination may result in death or serious injury.
Its important that your replacement diving board is from the same brand/manufacturer as the one being replaced
Corrosion-resistant stainless steel hardware is included
product_description: Product Description The Frontier III Residential Board is intended for moderate to heavy duty use on residential pools. It features an anti-slip tread for maximum safety and comes in 6', 8' and 10' lengths. Weight capacity is 250 lbs. From the Manufacturer S.R. Smith's 6-Feet Frontier III replacement board has a durable acrylic outer body, a non-slip, sanded tread and is pre-drilled with two holes for ease in installation. With hand-laid fiberglass and resin roving over a laminated wood runner acting as the board's skeletal frame, the Frontier III board will provide years of fun and safety on residential pools. It features the same non-slip, sanded tread as seen on other S.R.Smith boards. Will retrofit onto the following S.R.Smith stands - Flyte-Deck II, 606 Cantilever, 656 Supreme and the U-Frame. All S.R.Smith boards come with a how-to diving instructional video to ensure maximum safety when using your board.

name: Diving Board Bolt Kit, Diving Board Mounting Kit for Two Hole Residential Pool Diving Board, Diving Board Bolts Kit Compatible Diving Boards for Inground Pools
short_description: Applicable Scenarios: Diving board bolts are fixed kits designed to replace two hole residential diving boards with a length of 6, 8 or 10 feet. Regular inspection and replacement of the diving board bolt kit can avoid the danger caused by bolt damage and let you enjoy the fun of swimming pool in summer without worry

Package Contents: The diving board mounting kit consists of 2 1/2 x 4-1/2" stainless steel carriage bolts, 2 washer caps tops, 2 washer caps bottom, 4 rubber mounting washers, 2 stainless steel flat washers, 2 stainless steel lock washers, 2 copper nuts, 2 vinyl protective caps

Sturdy and Stable Material: All the metal parts of the dividing board bolt kit are made of high quality stainless steel, which is strong and wear resistant and provides strong locking force. Both plastic and rubber parts are made of corrosion resistant and oxidation resistant polymer materials to achieve a longer service cycle and reduce the maintenance frequency greatly

Simple Installation: The installation of the residential diving board bolts are very simple. The best installation effect can be achieved by strictly following the parts arrangement sequence in the manual. The rubber gasket can provide toughness and eliminate abnormal noise. The gasket cover and vinyl protective cap can beautify the appearance and prevent scratches caused by exposed metal parts

Benefits and Services: The dividing board hardware kit can provide sufficient security when you use the dividing board. Before purchasing, please confirm whether the diving board screws size is suitable for your dividing board. We offer 100% satisfaction guarantee and friendly customer service

name: IWIWE 67-209-911-SS Pool Diving Board Bolts Mounting Kit Replacement for S.R.Smith Two Hole Residential Diving Board of 6ft/8ft/10ft,Diving Board Resurfacing Kit with Bolts/Washers/Nuts etc
short_description: 【Perfectly Compatible】The 67-209-911-SS Diving Board Bolts Mounting Kit is compatible with S.R. Smith two-hole residential dive boards of 6ft/8ft/10ft.

【Upgrade Materials】All metal parts are made of stainless steel, a strong and durable material. Plastic and rubber parts are made of resistant polymers, which make them stronger and less likely to break.

【Bolt Kit Includes】Pool diving board bolt kit includes 2pcs 1/2 " Hex Nuts；2pcs 1/2" x 2" Flat Washers；2pcs 1/2" x 4-1/2" Carriage Bolts；2pcs 1/2" Lock Washers；2pcs 1/2 " Plastic Nut Cap；4pcs 1/2" x 2" Black Rubber Mounting Washers；2pcs White Plastic Recessed Mounting Washer Assembly.

【Easy Installation】To replace a residential diving board installation kit, follow the diagram and order of parts.Rubber gaskets provide toughness and eliminate unusual noises. Gasket covers and vinyl caps protect the look and prevent scratches.

【After-Sales Service】At IWIWE, we are committed to ensuring the quality of each 67-209-911-SS diving board bolt kit we manufacture. Our bolt kits are crafted from premium metal materials and backed by a one-year after-sales service.
